name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add the onions and garlic and cook until softened.
Stir in the tomato sauce, salt and pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet.
Toss the spaghetti with the sauce.
Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese over the top and serve.
